info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 4:55AM EST until January 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and sleet along with some snow expected. Ice accumulation from freezing rain is expected to range from a light glaze to one tenth of an inch. Total snow and sleet accumulations are expected to range from a coating up to one inch. * WHERE...Southern Vermont, northwestern Connecticut, western Massachusetts and eastern NY except for Hamilton, northern Herkimer, northern Warren, and northern Washington counties. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to ice accumulation from freezing rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
